apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.39.5.
- YouPiP v1.7.11: Added `de, it` localization.
- YTUHD v1.3.1: Added `ar, de, it, ko, ru, vi, zh_cn` localization.
- Return YouTube Dislike v1.7.1: Added `ko` localization support. 

## Attention:
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- Workarounds for deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App): [see here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).
- **CercubePlus** requires iOS 14 and up. If you're on iOS 12, use [CercubePlus (Legacy)](https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/tree/iOS-12).

apps.name: v17.37.3-5.3.11 (CercubePlus_17.37.3_5.3.11.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.37.3.
- iSponsorBlock: fixed app crashes in YouTube v17.37.3.
- YTUHD v1.3.0: Add support for multi language: Arab, Russian, Vietnamese. Feel free to add your language to YTUHD [here](https://github.com/PoomSmart/YTUHD/tree/master/layout/Library/Application%20Support/YTUHD.bundle).
- CercubePlus:
  - Fixed the issue with Google Sign-in (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/420). No need to use the tricky workaround anymore.
  - The Buildapp Github action no longer removes app binary's entitlements when building the IPA.

## Attention:
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- Workarounds for deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App): [see here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

apps.name: v17.35.3-5.3.11 (CercubePlus_17.35.3_5.3.11.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
# Note: 
- Google has just added another obstacle to prevent signing into YouTube on sideloaded version of YouTube. You'll get this warning "**Google couldn't confirm this attempt to sign in is safe. If you think this is a mistake, you can close and try again to sign in.**". Please understand that it's completely different from the previous issue (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/319).
- Some accounts are not affected by this problem and can be signed in without a problem. We still don't know why though. No **real** solution has been confirmed yet. You can discuss about the issue here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/discussions/428
- With the release of [**TrollStore**](https://github.com/opa334/TrollStore), I **highly recommend** you use [**TrollStore**](https://github.com/opa334/TrollStore) to install CercubePlus:
  - Working Push notifications.
  - Working Deep link (aka Open in YouTube app).
  - YTUHD will use hardware VP9 just like the official YouTube from AppStore, which means no more stuttering, heat, battery drain...
  - No need to refresh the app after 7 days. 
  - Completely free.
 
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.35.3.
- Return YouTube Dislike v1.6.7: Fixed the app crashes when opening videos (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/discussions/428), thanks to @PoomSmart <3
- CercubePlus:
  - Added an option to fix Google Signin (TrollStore user only).
  - Added an option to replace the Previous & Next button with Fast foward & Rewind button.
  - You can now swipe right to dismiss the right panel when in full screen mode.
  
## Attention:
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).
- **CercubePlus** requires iOS 13 and up. If you're on iOS 12, use [CercubePlus (Legacy)](https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/tree/iOS-12).

## Support the developers:
- [**Majd Alfhaily**](https://twitter.com/freemanrepo): simply tap the donate button in Cercube's setting.

apps.name: v17.30.3-5.3.10 (CercubePlus_17.30.3_5.3.10.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Attention!
- Google has added a new implementation which prevents **new** user from sign in to modified YouTube app (see [Less secure apps](https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/6010255?hl=en)) - #319.
- Basically, If the bundle ID of the app is modified, Google won't let us sign in. This issue mainly occurs with new user, who first time sign in to uYouPlus (or any other modified YouTube app). **If you're already signed it, you will be fine**. Just don't remove the app so you don't have to sign in again. 
- With that being said, some people are not affected by this issue at all. For now, we still don't know why is it like that. There still is a workaround, but it's not available for free user. See https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/319#issuecomment-1200137309.

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.30.3.
- CercubePlus: 
  - Fixed Hide Previous and Next Button not working.
  - Added Portuguese Brazilian localization (#10).
  - Minor improvements.
- YouPiP: Added Portuguese Brazilian localization.

## Attention:
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).
- **CercubePlus** requires iOS 13 and up. If you're on iOS 12, use [CercubePlus (Legacy)](https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/tree/iOS-12).

apps.name: v17.19.2-5.3.9 (CercubePlus_17.19.2_5.3.9.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube 17.19.2
- Added [YTMiniplayerEnabler](https://github.com/level3tjg/YTMiniplayerEnabler): enable miniplayer for all YouTube videos. You can enable it in CercubePlus's setting.
- CercubePlus:
  - Added an option to hide Cercube button in the Navigation bar (original idea by @dayanch96).
  - Added an option to hide the PiP/ Download button of Cercube in the video player.
  - Added an option to hide the Cast button (because this feature in Cercube not working).
  - Added an option to hide Channel watermarks (@dayanch96).
- OLED dark mode: 
  - Switching between Dark/Light theme no longer requires app restart. (Enable/disable OLED Dark mode still requires app restart though).
  - Improved performance.

## Attention:
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).
- **CercubePlus** requires iOS 13 and up. If you're on iOS 12, use [CercubePlus (Legacy)](https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/tree/iOS-12).

## Attention: - YTUHD is not stable atm. If you're on iOS 12, use [CercubePlus (Legacy)](https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/tree/iOS-12). ## Version info:

## Changelog: - YouTube v17.17.4 - YouPiP v1.6.12: bump version. - Added [Open in YouTube Extensions](https://github.com/CokePokes/YoutubeExtensions) - by @CokePokes: Basically, this is a combination of [Open in YouTube shortcut](https://shortcutsgallery.com/shortcuts/open-in-youtube/) and [Open in YouTube userscript](#69). In order to make the extensions work correctly, you **MUST** keep the app's extensions when install the iPA (especially AltStore users). _uYouPlus now takes 3 app IDs in total._ ==> See here how to configure the Extensions: https://github.com/CokePokes/YoutubeExtensions#readme

## Attention: - If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3. - Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads" - YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. - It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work). - **CercubePlus** requires iOS 13 and up. If you're on iOS 12, use [CercubePlus (Legacy)](https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/tree/iOS-12). ## Version info:

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.16.4
- YouPiP v1.6.11:
  - Updated to work on YouTube v17.16.4.
  - Added an option to disable PiP when mini player is actived.
- Added options to hide the Autoplay and the Subtitles button in the video controls overlay.
- OLED Dark mode now only works when YouTube is in Dark theme (app restart is still required).

## Attention:
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). However, there are a few workarounds:

  - iOS 14: [Open in YouTube](https://shortcutsgallery.com/shortcuts/open-in-youtube/) shortcut.
  - [Opener](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/opener-open-links-in-apps/id989565871) is a paid app from AppStore that allows you to open links from the web in apps.

apps.name: v17.15.2-5.3.9 (CercubePlus_17.15.2_5.3.9.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog: - YouTube v17.15.2 - Improved OLED dark mode. - YTUHD v1.2.7: temporary fix for missing 720p+ quality in HDR videos (Issue #100). Note that **adding HDR for 720p+ quality will be low priority**. So, please, don't ask. > _Using VP9 codec is not recommended since it might cause suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) due to missing hardware decoder. More info [here](https://github.com/PoomSmart/YTUHD#sideloading)._

## Attention: - It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). However, there are a few workarounds: - Safari extension: iOS 15 users can follow this workaround (Safari extension + Userscript): https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/69 - iOS 14: [Open in YouTube](https://shortcutsgallery.com/shortcuts/open-in-youtube/) shortcut. - [Opener](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/opener-open-links-in-apps/id989565871) is a paid app from AppStore that allows you to open links from the web in apps. - **CercubePlus** requires iOS 13 and up.
